references.paper_title: Learning representations by maximizing mutual information across views
references.reason: This paper introduces a contrastive learning framework that maximizes mutual information between different views, a core concept underpinning the proposed Garner framework.

references.paper_title: Spatial structure-aware road network embedding via graph contrastive learning
references.reason: This work directly addresses road network representation learning using graph contrastive learning, providing a relevant baseline and methodological comparison for the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Robust road network representation learning: When traffic patterns meet traveling semantics
references.reason: This paper focuses on robust road network representation learning, addressing a challenge that the proposed method aims to improve upon through the integration of the Third Law of Geography.

references.paper_title: Contrastive multi-view representation learning on graphs
references.reason: This work introduces a graph contrastive learning framework, which is the foundation for the proposed method's architecture and learning objective.
This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of graph self-supervised learning techniques, which are relevant to the proposed framework and its design choices.
